setting.location: Rustic roadside inn, Spanish countryside between villages

characters.appearance: Thin knight, late 40s, maintaining noble bearing despite dust
characters.clothing: Travel-worn armor, helmet under arm, red sash faded
characters.position: Standing in inn courtyard, addressing building as if castle
characters.action: Bowing formally to inn entrance, hand on sword hilt

characters.appearance: Stocky squire, early 40s, tired but alert
characters.position: Still mounted on donkey, watching master with concern
characters.action: Scratching head in confusion while holding both animals' reins

characters.appearance: Robust innkeeper, 50s, large belly, bald head
characters.clothing: Stained apron over shirt, rolled sleeves
characters.action: Staring in amazement at armored guest

scene.mainElements: Simple two-story inn with stable attached, knight treating humble establishment as noble castle, comedy of misperception, warm light spilling from windows and door, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Wooden inn sign creaking in breeze, horses in stable yard, chickens roosting for night, wine barrels stacked against wall, rough wooden benches outside, smoke from chimney, other travelers' horses tied to posts, water trough for animals, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Darkening countryside, silhouettes of distant hills, first evening stars
scene.atmosphere: Collision between fantasy and reality, gentle comedy in knight's formal behavior at common inn, bewilderment of ordinary people encountering extraordinary delusion, warm hospitality despite confusion, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot encompassing inn entrance and courtyard
composition.focus: Triangle of interaction between knight, squire, and innkeeper
composition.depth: Foreground shows inn detail, middle ground captures character interaction, background fades to evening landscape

colorPalette.usageNotes: Black lines on white background only
